subject: Order #SSN5159
description_text:
Hello, I have a problem with my new Simsonn Plus-X pedals.
The accelerator pedal squeaks and the damper is leaking oil. I have
attached some pictures. If necessary, I also have a video where you can
hear it.
I bought the pedals on December 30, 2025, and they have only been used for
a maximum of 4 hours so far.

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Piper, ​We will send you a brand-new one-way hydraulic rod for the throttle tomorrow for replacement.
Hi Michael Piper,  Additionally, the hydraulic rod uses a pure liquid structure, so hearing a slight fluid sound during movement is normal.
Hi Michael Piper,    Here is your replacement link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047237444743
